body: Minor-risk tasks include deliberately leaving a door to a private area unlocked, acquiring a semi-legal item for you, or finding a place for you to lie low. Negative consequences can include paying a small fine, provoking the ire of the local authorities, suffering a small financial loss, or enduring social embarrassment.
name: 2. Minor

sections.body: Fine or imprisonment with bail. You must spend 1/3 the value of the contact's gear (see Table 14—9: NPC Gear on page 454 of the Core Rulebook) to rectify this situation; otherwise, you lose the contact, and all current and future contacts have their Trust scores lowered by 1 with you.
sections.name: Critical Failure
